casebody.data:
Marc MALECEK
v.
Derek WILLIAMS No. 341P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Jason Scott Smith, Attorney at Law, for Malecek, Marc. Joslin Davis, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, Kim R. Bonuomo, Bennett D. Rainey, Attorneys at Law, for Williams, Derek.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the notice of appeal from the North Carolina Court of Appeals, filed by Defendant on the 10th of October 2017 in this matter pursuant to G.S. 7A-30 (substantial constitutional question), the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: the notice of appeal is

"Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of October 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
